>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/foreign-exchange/{pactualId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Endpoint used to get a previously created quote/trade.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"pactualId","schema":{"nullable":true,"type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
